Dilworth abuser got away at 1978 meeting, allowing more boys to be hurt, two former students say https://www.nzherald.co.nz/business/dilworth-abuser-got-away-at-1978-meeting-allowing-more-boys-to-be-hurt-two-former-students-say/AFP7JZT3PVF7RK3YGCJNDTTKZY/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/business/dilworth-abuser-got-away-at-1978-meeting-allowing-more-boys-to-be-hurt-two-former-students-say/AFP7JZT3PVF7RK3YGCJNDTTKZY/ John Weekes'It set a precedent - that if you get caught, you were just allowed to leave.' The board did not report the staff member to police. Photo / NZME
